replies.message: Thanks for the <3, Shahbaz. We appreciate you! -Rey

Dear Rey, I have a one Question, I m trying since last 6 month to verify my Da Artist Page. This is my Photography Page. How can i verify this page.

I submitted NTN Registered Number, CNIC, Electricity Bill, Passport, Request letter on Company letter Head, but i got Negative response. This is registered company in Pakistan. What i have suppose to do now? can you suggest me.

There is no Facebook Head Office in Pakistan. where i have to go?

Best Regards,
CEO of Da Artist

Hi Shabaz. If you're an admin of a local business Page, you may be eligible for a gray verification badge, which you'll see in your Page's settings. Currently, not all Pages are eligible for verification. You can learn more about Page verification here: http://on.fb.me/1PHkXu6. Hope this helps answer your question! -Rey

Dear Rey, I tried same steps. Got call for calfonia n I enter 4 digit. Then I submitted all official documents. Including Electricity Bill, Company NTN Number, Request letter on Company Letter Head, CNIC, Passport, Company profile, etc.

Event we have official website as well, www.daartist.com,  we have all chennals of Da Artist. Twitter,  Instagram, Google Blog, Pinterest, Tumblr, 

Rey, It's humble request to you do something for me. Can you give me private email Address or phone number in private message box. That I can send you my all official documents. I wana my company page in any cost. This is registered company. 

Regards,
Shahbaz Akhtar Cheema 
www.facebook.com/DaArtistPhoto
